subject: re:On-line generic store
body:
Dear valued member.
Get incredible Spring discounts from MyCanadianPharmacy.  
We supply our customers with affordable and safe Canadian products which are of the same quality as American drugs. 
For more information click herehttp://thefall.hk
Easy and secure ordering process.All your personal information will remain private and confidential.The highest quality customer service. Fast and safe delivery. 
Best regards,Alfonzo Stubbs
